website_summaries.verdict: Available in a whopping 22  colors, this versatile and strong yoga hammock/swing is a complete kit for aerial work.
pros: Stretchy nylon fabric moves with you instead of fighting you
Comes with travel bag and 2 locking carabiner clips
cons: Some feel the fabric is too thin or too stretchy
Some orders were shipped in the wrong color

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color, fun hammock
customer_reviews.text: I really love the color of this hammock and it works well. It’s a lot stretchier than I’m used to at the studio, but maybe that’s something that relaxes over time. You can see from the pictures how stretchy it is, but it feels secure once it’s stretched tight to do flips and such.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Dee

customer_reviews.title: Soft, stretchy fabric
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much! I do pole and aerial yoga. This hammock was the perfect addition to my home studio. I bought jungle gym hooks to support the hammock and had a contractor put a wooden block in the attic to make sure it was extra secure. I am in love with the color too!
customer_reviews.author: lawschoolmomma

customer_reviews.title: does have some stretch which makes it very comfortable when relaxing in it
customer_reviews.text: I could not wait for my hammock to come in! I had done a few classes and became obsessed, so buying one was the next step! I am impressed with the softness of the material, does have some stretch which makes it very comfortable when relaxing in it. Easy to assemble. I did have to watch some videos to make sure I was tying it correctly. It comes with paper instructions, I just needed some reassurance. Love that this product comes with everything including an ice bag to tote around for easy transfer. Overall, I am impressed and excited to use this hammock to develop my skills and I hope it lasts me for a long time! Thanks F.Life!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany K

customer_reviews.title: Great swing!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for myself and my children, kids love to sit and swing and lay down in hammock. Silk is durable and good quality. Provides lots of entertainment for the winter. Purchased separate attachments to the ceiling that don’t come with this pack but not a big deal. The fabric easily holds me and my children all at the same time. I see lots of fun with this to come!
customer_reviews.author: SSS

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully made, 10/10
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderfully made. I would absolutely reccomend this Ariel hammock to anyone, I'm really happy with mine. I've mounted it in my apartment from the ceiling from two points, with some mounting hardware I got at the supply store. I made sure to use really sturdy bolts and equipment rated for 1000 lbs. Also be sure if you're mounting into a ceiling to mount into a stud. The way you mount this is extremely important because if the mounting were to fail while you're hanging upside down you could be seriously injured. The hammock itself is very strong and very safe to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lion

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking for a hammock to do aerial yoga or just relax, this is it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and not too stretchy. This hammock exceeded my expectations and it is the best value you can get out of all the yoga hammocks on this site. I got the silver and the color is true to the photo. I can fit my dad in this thing and he is 5’11” for reference. It meets my every need and is a fun way to keep fit. I feel sad leaving it to go to work everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't look any where else!!! This is the one you want
customer_reviews.text: This is the REAL DEAL!!! I haven't tried it out yet but this was worth every penny! The caribiners are extreme heavy duty. I think you could hang an elephant from them and they wouldn't break Very high quality item. I am very happy with my purchase. Everything was packaged beautifully as well. YOU WILL NOT BE SORRY!! I tried being cheap and looking elsewhere. For what you are getting in this package, it is worth every cent This is also a FULL hammock. Meaning you can lay flat in this
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this yoga hammock! I’ve been doing aerial yoga for over a year now, and I’ve been on the hunt for the perfect sling. I ordered this one knowing I had about a 10 foot ceiling to work with - I wanted to make sure I could adjust the tails to fit, and this had more than enough fabric to accommodate. I bought daisy chains just in case, but I didn’t even need them.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Strong
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Strong, easy to rig and hanged it on our swing set. Was looking for a silk sling big enough and strong enough to hold a large and tall person and cocoon my son who is on the spectrum. This one does and it has just enough stretch not to pinch. Gives you a nice hug when used as a hammock. Great price too. i can get it up and down with no trouble. I laid in it last night with the dog and watched the stars, it was hot and the fabric was not sticky or clinging to me.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: My kids are in love! They are trying out the positions
customer_reviews.text: My kids are in love! They are trying out the positions, creating new ones or using it as a swing 😊. Of course this is not something designed to be a toy but I do feel comfortable with my daughter's abilities and know this is something they can handle... For them it is hung a bit low so for me it's a bit difficult to try many of the positions but I can say the fabric is both sturdy as it should be but still soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and only requires ceiling hooks.
customer_reviews.text: So far we really like this kit and have found it to be better quality than expected. It came in a really nice cotton bag with decent instructions, which I didn’t exactly follow since I needed the system to be adjustable. We installed this in a basement family room with an 8 foot ceiling and at 5’9” I can manage most moves with it. I’d recommend it, and have recommended it to a friend already.
customer_reviews.author: MikeW

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga hammock for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I received my yoga hammock about a week and a half ago and I am very impressed with it so far!! I was nervous at first that the length would not be long enough, but it actually worked out perfectly. It does come with daisy chains, a yoga pose guide (beginner and intermediate), and carabiners. The fabric itself is just stretchy enough to have a bit of give when laying in a full cocoon, but stays taught when bunching up the fabric for doing some hang poses. I am not super experienced with aerial yoga, but I fully trust the durability of this hammock.
customer_reviews.author: Reli

customer_reviews.title: Love! Bigger them expected
customer_reviews.text: Love! Bigger them expected ! This is my first silk yoga hammock! Can't wait to start playing around and perfect some yoga poses as well as see how far I can extend my yoga experience !
customer_reviews.author: marisela hart

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, knot directions included, able to cacoon, fabric has a bit of give to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: So far this has been great. Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been great. Easy to set up and use. My daughter and I have enjoyed playing with it. I have her some craniosacral work as she relaxed in it hammock style. I'm exploring yoga poses and loving it. Seems to be of high quality though I cannot compare to any other as it's my first. Would love an option to have handles separate. Seems like all yoga hammocks have either no handles or sewn on handles. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WARNING - NOT AUTHENTIC AERIAL FABRIC - UNSAFE!
customer_reviews.text: The kit was great, but NOT authentic aerial fabric. Thin, flimsy and unsafe. Low thread count - known to tear during use.
customer_reviews.author: YourGirLisa

customer_reviews.title: I'll give it time, stretchy compared to what I'm familiar with.
customer_reviews.text: Came in a travel bag with 2 Daisy's and 2 locking carabiners. Love the burg Andy wine color. My husband used anchor screws directly into a support beam. I have this hanging on my back porch. I had my very first light play on it today. The material is STRETCHY. More than I'm used to but we shall see. Because of the stretch it took me 3 adjustments to find my proper height. Not sure if the hammocks in class are thicker material or more material but when doing sacrum wrap the silk felt more like a rope across me instead of a softer silk. But that just might be adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: MY opinion

customer_reviews.title: It'll get the job done
customer_reviews.text: I do aerial yoga in a studio two nights a week so I thought I would get a silk for the house and I bought this one. The fabric used for these silks is not nearly as nice, shiny, thick or stretchy as I am used to. I will be buying the fabric from fabric.com and cutting it to size in the future but this will do for now.
customer_reviews.author: lindz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy quality, so fun!
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST yoga silks. We love them. So sturdy, quality material, both fabric and metal of the carabiners. We even left them outside for weeks on end in hot sun and later in snow. For cleanliness I would take them in unless I forgot. The stay clean unless, as I could imagine, you have lots of birds doing their business on top of where you install them. We don’t have that issue. All together, we have two of these. So our kid can use them with a friend. We simply attached them to our swing set. It’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Simone W.

customer_reviews.title: Too much stretch, has to be tied very high and short.
customer_reviews.text: I unlike the other reviewers, actually can't stand this fabric. It stretches SO MUCH that I have to tie it twice as high just to keep from hitting my head on the floor. Which also means it's too high for my practice. The fabric for some reason, maybe because it stretches and so it tightens, hurts. The fabric never tightened so much through my teacher training that it was actually unbearable. Will not recommend to other teachers.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Awful Eyesore Misleading photos
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my daughters’ room for them to do their silk routine. Their room is a lovely grey/blue and purple. When I opened the package the colour was a bright blue and not the soft ‘lake blue’ that was advertised in the text or the photo. Very misleading. Instead of a calm beautiful set up, I have these 2 silks sticking out like sore thumbs on the room. Everyone asks why I chose that colour when they visit as it doesn’t blend in at all and not at all in keeping with the decor. Awful!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: Works well - but not studio grade
customer_reviews.text: This hammock is good, but it is not like the hammocks I'm used to using in the studio. It is not quite as silky and it has a too much stretch to it. Plan to adjust it a little higher than you would normally to prevent hitting your head on the floor during inversions. It feels like it is of a cheaper quality. It is slightly too short in length to do a secure feeling mosquito/vampire pose if you are tall. Otherwise it's decent, and comes with 2 carabiners, daisy chains, and a nice little bag to carry it in.
customer_reviews.author: Abee

customer_reviews.title: Love this product! Here is why I recommend it:
customer_reviews.text: I just really enjoy my yoga aerial set ❤️ I wish I had more places to put it. I may have to buy a ladder now 😅 it is a little bit expensive but such an amazing workout in the long run! I feel like I can actually work out and enjoy working out which I don’t say ever. So I recommend doing this and yoga trapeze for beginners! 👍🏽 Especially if you are above 40 and haven’t worked out much, I recommend highly using a yoga trapeze first! It’s much safer to do alone.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: this is okay
customer_reviews.text: the silk is far too stretchy so when you sit on it, it pulls down significantly to the point that you touch the ground. if you move the links up higher, to counter act that, you need a step stool to get in it! and i yes i do have it set up properly. definitely not the same ones are the local yoga studio uses!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy. Invest in a safe product.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install but I fell and have a concussion. They don’t include the 360 swivel or secure tie bars. You should find a professional kit that includes stretchy fabric. This gave me bruises. No stretch. Maybe for children, not aerial. The fabric is horrible. Their idea of safety is tie knots. First time up I fell on travertine head first.
customer_reviews.author: Ducky

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this hammock and the price! I had to buy a separate kit to hang the hammock but it was only $7. Overall this was a minor investment with major benefits. It is so much fun to use and a great workout! The setup took me about three hours but once the ceiling beams are found it is a piece of cake. My ceilings are 8.5 feet and it is at a perfect height.
customer_reviews.author: Vada

customer_reviews.title: This was a HUGE hit with all the cousins at Christmas.
customer_reviews.text: They learned new skills (from the included book and on-line) and they fought over who got to relax inside the "cocoon". A great purchase and we are very happy with it. Haven't washed it yet & fingers crossed that will work bc we bought white and it's starting to look grungy (and smell too) from all the use it gets.
customer_reviews.author: Sequin

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted. Ripped within 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: This hammock is soft and stretchy.... however, it developed a tear within months of use. Overall impression: initially very satisfied, now disappointed. Use: laying for chill time, swinging, occasional inversion. There is a 6 inch long tear in the material and one end has already opened into a small hole, which will surely expand in time. Given how long we have had it, and the mild wear, this product should have lasted longer. If you are looking for a soft, stretchy hammock that is comfortable but does not need to last long this could be a fit for you. If you are looking for a a product that will last a good while, I'd keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Lanna

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: Wish it came with a second set of caribiners so you could attach the daisy chains to your ceiling hooks. Otherwise, I am happy with it because it's a very large piece of fabric, stretchy, and doesn't attract animal hair (a big issue at my house). It will easy encase my 5'5" frame for corpse pose
customer_reviews.author: Nada

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was the greatest gift for our 7 year old granddaughter! She has been talking silk lessons as she is proficient in gymnastics. We had to buy mount hardware for hanging which was around $20. Overall less than $100 investment for our granddaughter. In addition, tge silk is a great piece of fabric.
customer_reviews.author: engbuldoglovr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my at home training.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my deck space. It has more stretch than the studio silks but it's perfect for my at home practice and conditioning. Super easy to put up and take down once the knots are tied onto the caribeiners, you can easily attach to the daisy chain they provide. I do take it down and indoors when I am not using it to protect the integrity of the fabric. I got the light green color and its beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: H_sue

customer_reviews.title: Stretched out a bit
customer_reviews.text: I have to re-tie the knots because it has stretched out a bit. Other than that, the feel is that of aerial silks, not parachute yoga swings.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Keeps kids active!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, except you have to buy the anchors to install it as this kit does not come with them. We bought it for our daughter for Christmas and she has spent hundreds of hours on it and learning all sorts of cool tricks. Great way to keep a kid entertained and active when it’s freezing outside in the winter, but also fun anytime!
customer_reviews.author: M. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this product gave me the ultimate change to my yoga routine also it is an added bonus to have a hammock hanging in my living room area where I set up in my apartment as my yoga corner. I enjoy using it because it is not as flimsy or stretchy as some Ariel yoga hammocks I have tried in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Nb238

customer_reviews.title: The best investment!
customer_reviews.text: My kids especially love this! My 8 year old daughter asked for it for her birthday. She’s in it for hours everyday. She is gaining strength in her core and can relax and watch videos on her phone in it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few weeks now. I bought it for my 4.5 high motion kid. She LOVES it! Plays for a minimum of an hour a day on it. Extremely sturdy. Holds my 250lb husband with my 45lb daughter with no problems at all. Would buy 100 times again!! The fabric is silky yet very durable. Stretchy but thick. We use it mainly as a swing.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Almost everything you need for your arial yoga setup! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Just buy your ceiling anchors and your ready to go! This is a great value for the money. Was so easy to set up. The silk is so nice and soft. Stretches well, but doesn’t stretch out. So comfy you have to resist sleeping in it, instead of working out;)
customer_reviews.author: NLB

customer_reviews.title: Carbiners are faulty.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the actual silk fabric but beware you will need to purchase additional carbiners, the ones that come with are faulty and often get stuck and won't unscrew, had to take pliars to it. That's not what you want to have to do with your aerial equipment ! And these are the cheapest of cheapest daisy chains.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great yoga swing
customer_reviews.text: I have only just received this, but it is a wonderful yoga swing. It is a bit stretchier than the ones at the studio, but it does what it needs to do and I just hang it higher so I don't hit the floor with inversions. The material is soft and comfortable and Savasana is heavenly in it. I have an indoor outdoor stand and so, last night was yoga under the stars. A beautiful, floating relax, stretch, strengthen and dream.
customer_reviews.author: blue

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's soft and stretchy enough to be super comfortable for relaxing, too. Excellent for a workout even without the handles of the parachute-fabric ones. Lovely color. The hardware is perfect, too and I'm happy it's included as it's quite expensive to buy separately.
customer_reviews.author: Jfishmommy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, wow, wow! These are so comfortable. It’s the perfect amount of “give” and contours to my body without making me feel like my skin is being ripped off. I LOVE THIS KIT!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I had tried a cheaper version, and returned it, because it was made of the wrong material. And others are overpriced. I'm happy with this so far.
customer_reviews.author: Camper Cora

customer_reviews.title: Already has a hole
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my daughters Christmas present. We just put it up the other day and it has a small hole in it almost like a perfect square. I am not sure if it came with the hole or got it after we put it up but it has now ran and we will have to replace the silk and she has had it less than a week. I should have checked the silk more thoroughly before hanging it. But even if the silk did get a hole after hanging that says to me it isnt very good quality. The color was beautiful but i wouldnt recommend this brand because I dont believe it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love it for back pain
customer_reviews.text: At first it hurt a ton to hang from it and I was getting all sorts of bruises. Make sure you use thick clothing to support your body weight. This is a must for spinal decompression. Also, have a professional install or break your neck.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Sue

customer_reviews.title: Fabric came stained!
customer_reviews.text: Great sling, just what I wanted BUT the fabric has stains on it! I don’t understand why quality control is so hard to expect these days!
customer_reviews.author: YogaNinja

customer_reviews.title: Great Swings , Ordered Each Color .**Do Not Buy Blackish Green ****
customer_reviews.text: Buy these ! I researched for my studio many silk swings & I chose these based on price & quality . I ordered 8 , one of each color . Each of these swings has been great w/ the exception of the blackish green one , it had to much stretch & not suitable for group classes ! Great material & easy to install .
customer_reviews.author: Mom Doing Life

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up after consulting youtube for better instructions.
customer_reviews.text: very easy to set up however I wish there were instructions included tht told you how to use the daisy chains. I has to consult youtube for full instructions. However after setting it up it has been wonderful to use at home. I will be buying another set for my outdoor aerial rig.
customer_reviews.author: Thi Phomprida

customer_reviews.title: Great hammock for price
customer_reviews.text: I love this hammock. I have done studio aerial yoga for months and this hammock is good but not as great as the ones at the studio. This one has a little more stretch to it so I find that when I go upside down that my head touches the ground. When I adjust it higher then doing other stuff it's too high. But overall this is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Love this hammock!
customer_reviews.text: After ordering a different hammock and receiving one that was made out of parachute material which was horrible, I absolutely love this hammock! Strong giving material. Easy to put together. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Krupp

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the family!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to get my fitness on via aerial yoga. When I am not using it, I lower it down and my preschooler thinks it is the coolest swing in the history of the world. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: 5.5 YARDS IS VERY VERY SHORT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This hammock IS NOT LONG ENOUGH! I have had this hammock for 1 week and Im disappointed.. im already looking into buying a new one. I feel like I wasted my money...
customer_reviews.author: Skyler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice for home!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great for stretching my back out. So comfortable to take naps. Meditating is so easy when hanging in air. 💞
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use at my gym so I don't have to share. It isn't too stretchy. I followed instructions to tie, but needed help still.
customer_reviews.author: L. Carrico

customer_reviews.title: Good but..
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It's nice material and no flaws. I do agree with other reviews that it is a bit too stretchy. Even at hip length, sitting in it takes me to the floor (160lbs)
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: DO YOUR RESEARCH! Buy mounts separate save money!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Did my research bought mounts and rescue 8 separate, easy hang , fast shipping! Buying a second for my sister! And the kids love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Jessalynn Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Home Yoga Studio
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to install, and i watched a youtube video as to how tie the knots of the hammock. I love it, and all the neighborhood kids love it. It's very strong, fun, and hard to believe its so affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Red Head

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love this so far — durable, but soft and comfortable, and the color is gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Murray

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: This is the kind of silk I was hoping for...& I’ve taught on & worked with many types. This is smooth and beautiful. Comes with a cute zipping tote bag, too.
customer_reviews.author: Susang

customer_reviews.title: Have Hammock Will Travel!
customer_reviews.text: I love my hammock! It travels with me wherever I go! I’m an aerial yoga instructor and this hammock is super soft & supportive! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: WD

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It's a really good hammock for the price. Very pretty and a good amount of length. However, it is a bit thinner and stretchier than the ones I'm accustomed to training with in a professional studio. This isn't a terrible downside. I really like this hammock.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: The best physical and mental therapist ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This hammock is hands down the most important thing there is for physical therapy. ... and it does matter what the injury is!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M. Brewer

customer_reviews.title: and they LOVE it. Great gift for people
customer_reviews.text: We won't use it for yoga, we use it for the kids to play in, and they LOVE it. Great gift for people. Fabric is stretchy and strong. Easy to set up and take down
customer_reviews.author: A-Salis

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Nice quality silks, slight stretch which is more comfortable. Easy to install with included carabiners and daisy chains. Quick shipping. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter spends so much time on this! It is extremely sturdy and held all three of my teenage sons at once.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality issues.
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed in the quality of this produce. The fabric has far more stretch and give than posted in the item description. I wouldn't recommend for aerial yoga.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Wish it came with the looo because I struggled with that
customer_reviews.author: Ghalia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but slippery.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the entire packaging. The actual material of the silks is not as strong as what I’m used to. This material is very slippery. I’ve even tried using rosin.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great for Aerial!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this fabric for my Aerial sling class, great quality, it came with all the rigging hardware. and arrived in a small pouch and with the fabric inside. I will order another one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Melisa

customer_reviews.title: Very easy assembly!
customer_reviews.text: Love my aerial yoga hammock! And there are so many YouTube videos you can follow along to learn! Very easy to assemble- clear instructions!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: You are going to love this!
customer_reviews.text: These are so great. I ended up buying another one because our family, young and old, couldn't get enough of it. We attached them to our slackline and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for new learners!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been asking for an aerial silk all year! She was so excited to open this Christmas morning! The fabric is sturdy and a beautiful vibrant color! She absolutely loves it and we are very happy with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: my kids love this as a swing. easy to install although tying the knot was not completely simple from the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Andru Z

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect it was exactly what I was looking for. The quality is very good and the hot pink is almost exactly the same as the pictures
customer_reviews.author: Jenn C

customer_reviews.title: Not great for aerial
customer_reviews.text: This is better than the others being sold on Amazon I will be truthful. If you are using this as a regular hammock then its fine. Its okay if you are only doing general inversions but be prepared that it won't be comfy. Not very grippy so gloves recommended you can't do advanced or intermediate moves. It is good for cocooning but even so it is too much fabric lengthwise. It isn't stretchy either. As someone who has tried from all the brands here on Amazon I can tell you your best bet is to buy a cotton lycra blend . You have to tie with this kit anyway and its far less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Palermo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! Should be 16” apart when hung
customer_reviews.text: For traditional yoga silk work they should be 16” inches apart. I hung mine too far apart so the poses weren’t working. The silk itself is AMAZING and so comfortable / gorgeous
customer_reviews.author: Jeni fujita

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product..just as described! Using to replace swing on my daughter's swing set
customer_reviews.author: Jill Bonanno

customer_reviews.title: It was a present
customer_reviews.text: And the recipient loves it!! Easily one of the better presents I've ever bought this person
customer_reviews.author: AvgConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect! The “silk” has a great weight to it. The fabric is super strong and the kit comes with everything you need to hang it from a high beam.
customer_reviews.author: Jazma Dobbins

customer_reviews.title: Great Hammock and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality hammock. Perfect for practicing aerial yoga. I love that it comes with the daisy chains and carabiners. The fabric has just the right amount of stretch and the length is perfect for indoor use. Great quality for an amazing price.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first aerial hammock, and I'm in love! It was very easy to knit and hang, and is very sturdy! Great for a beginner like me. Thank you for such a great product at such a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Have to buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite hobby, and love using a set I can trust! Very easy to assemble, super sturdy and by far the most comfortable one I’ve had!!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Was fairly easy to install. Would recommend to anyone looking to purchase an aerial art/yoga hammock.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much! Can't wait to start my journey with the silks!
customer_reviews.author: Deise Costa

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. it was my first aerial silk. 5.5 yard is good length for a normal ceiling and the daisy chains add length. Once is get good at it, I plan on buying a longer length silk.
customer_reviews.author: Yangchen Dolma

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Good value! Fabric is soft with minimal stretch. Solid daisy chains and carabiners.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Fuchs

customer_reviews.title: Great! Although I wouldn't call that color "dark red", it's more of a "dark mexican pink".
customer_reviews.text: I don't have much experience but I really like using my hammock, it's as comfortable as one can get, good quality and it was delivered even earlier than scheduled to my home in México, my only complain is that in person the color isn't "dark red", just in photos.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Sánchez Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Great packaging. Came quickly good quality and good instructions

customer_reviews.title: BEST SILK EVER
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this Silk when I got it! I also like how long it is. The material of is very strong and soft. I really think you should buy this product

customer_reviews.title: This is every bit as nice as the hammock in expensive gyms.
customer_reviews.text: I adore my yoga hammock. I use it every day to stretch my spine. It is a godsend.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this yoga hammock so much! So do my kids! Exactly what I was looking for to duplicate the yoga hammock at my local aerial yoga class.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New hobby
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t really know what to expect but I will say I really like it so far. Very breathable and the color is nice. Got it because I wanted to try a new hobby.

customer_reviews.title: It's sooooo cool
customer_reviews.text: It's sooooo cool, my daughter loves it!!! Best birthday gift!

product_meta.title: Aerial Yoga Hammock 5.5 Yards Premium Aerial Silk Fabric Yoga Swing for Antigravity Yoga Inversion Include Daisy Chain,Carabiner and Pose Guide
product_meta.description:
What Kind Of Fabric Is The Hammock? 
The Aerial Yoga hammock is made of 5 meters of 40-denier Nylon Tricot fabric, which is the same type of fabric used in Cirque du Soleil performances.
40-Denier Nylon Tricot is a two-way stretch, when it is banded together like a swing, and when you cocoon inside the hammock 
the fabric gives just enough so that it feels comfortable for the body and skin. 

Does This Come Pre Knotted On The Carbine? 
No, it does not become pre-knotted. Our aerial yoga hammock kit include Knot tying guide - step-by-step instructions on making set-up safe and easy to follow.

Is This Stretchy Material? Can Be Fully Cocooned Or Laying Fully In It? 
Yes, the fabric does have give, it is a stretchy fabric. It is not like the parachute type of material used often on other yoga style swings.

Can The Daisy Loops Wrap Around An Expose Beam To Hang The Swing Without Drilling Into The Beam? 
Yes, you can! The daisy chains are very strong and are able to be used like that. We often recommend that you use the unlooped end of the daisy chain and place it 
through another loop after it is wrapped around the beam or pole. As you lay on the swing
it will cause tension on the loop formed around the beam/pole and hold you in place. 

How Wide Should I To Hang The Swing From? 
Shoulder distance is probably the safest and most supportive .

This Kit Works Perfect For. 
Aerial Yoga, yoga swing ,yoga sling ,aerial dance, aerial fitness ,air yoga ,aerial hammock ,Anti-Gravity Yoga, 
Unnata Yoga, Suspension Yoga, Gravity Yoga, Antigravity Yoga, Flying Yoga, Aerial Pilates， Pilates hammock
feature_bullets: There are many Aerial Yoga Hammocks on the market, but our Basic Aerial Yoga Hammock is made from Certified Quality Material And Hardware. 1 x 5.5 yards Elastic aerial hammock , 2 x Steel Screw-lock Carabiners (25KN), 2 x 3ft Nylon Reinforced Daisy Chains (23KN).Max rated for 2,000 pound dynamic load. The Daisy Chains and carabiners are certified to climbing standards.

40-Denier Nylon Tricot is a two-way stretch. when it is banded together like a swing, and when you cocoon inside the hammock the fabric gives just enough so that it feels comfortable for the body and skin.
It Can be Fully Cocooned Or Laying Fully In .It is a stretchy fabric. not like the parachute type of material used often on other yoga style swings.
This premium fabric is used for Yoga Slings and Aerial Silks. It is long lasting and comfortable. The double point is great for relaxation, stretching, stress reduction, and back pain.
This double point Yoga hammock is easy to get in and out of, easy to clean, super comfortable, and easy to adjust the height.Order it now, this is the best yoga hammock on the market！！
